roleset.name: tweak, cause change
roleset.note: TWEAK-V NOTES: Member of Vncls touch-20-1. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from tweak.01-v)

example.name: from Google, NBA
example.text: Varejao tweaked his ankle in Tuesday's win over the Pistons.
example.arg: in Tuesday's win over the Pistons

roleset.name: tweak on drugs
roleset.note: TWEAK-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT phase 1. Framed by Claire. (from tweak.02-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: Users tweaking on methamphetamine can exhibit this type of repetitive, mechanical behavior.

example.name: Really?
example.text: When I-2 went to my classes PRO-2 tweaking , I paid more attention to what was going on in class .
